type KeyboardEventHandler = delegate of obj * KeyboardEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender

summary.span: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà gli eventi indirizzati correlati alla tastiera.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle keyboard-related routed events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nessun evento della tastiera esistente in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] utilizza il delegare.No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the delegate.
